updates.delete_expired: function (doc, req) { if (doc.timestamp < req.query.mindate) { doc._deleted = true; return [doc, 'deleted']; } else return [doc, doc._id] }
updates.log: function(doc, req) { if (doc === null) doc = { _id: req.uuid }; var fields = JSON.parse(req.body); for (var i in fields) { if (i === 'info') { for (var s in fields[i]) { doc[i][s] = fields[i][s]; } } else { doc[i] = fields[i]; } } var resp = doc; delete resp._revisions; return [doc, toJSON(resp)]; }
updates.state: function (doc, req) { if (doc == null) return []; var fields = JSON.parse(req.body); for (var i in fields) { doc[i] = fields[i] }; delete doc._revisions; return [doc, toJSON(doc)]; }
